text: @Bill_Maxwell_ And just like that, he dismisses the death of George Floyd who said those words, dismisses the pain of his family & friends, dismisses the anger & hurt of a nation tired of watching people die. And he does the same for all those whose lives have been taken or affected by Covid19.
